long_description: A precise, all-around trail rocket, the Cannondale Scalpel 29er Alloy 4 full-suspension mountain bike offers great cross-country performance thanks to a Lefty fork, a light frame and 29 in. wheels. Lefty 29er fork with Push-Button Rebound (PBR) offers 100mm of smooth, responsive travel and precise handling; easy-access lockout and rebound controls are glove-friendly. RockShox Monarch RL rear shock and optimized pivot design combine for a responsive and plush rear suspension system. Very lightweight aluminum frame features a race-ready, agile design and plenty of stiffness for a responsive ride; super-stiff seatstays and chainstays minimize flex. Oversize 1.5 in. headtube enhances strength, rigidity and steering precision. Shimano Deore crankset is paired with Shimano SLX shifters, SLX Shadow Plus rear derailleur and Deore front derailleur to make up a 2x10 drivetrain with 20 gears. BB30 bottom bracket design increases stiffness for improved power-transfer. Shimano Deore hydraulic disc brakes supply easy speed management with a 180mm rotor up front, 160mm in the back. Stout Stans ZTR Rapid rims are outfitted with fast-rolling and versatile Schwalbe Racing Ralph tires for confident trail handling and traction. Specs on the Cannondale Scalpel 29er Alloy 4 full-suspension mountain bike are subject to change; pedals sold separately.
